business_context.name: HealingPath
business_context.target_audience: Women seeking private, convenient virtual healthcare

design_requirements.image_type: Service page hero/detail image for telehealth consultations

visual_style.lighting: Clean, bright lighting with professional ambiance

conversion_optimization.primary_message: Professional healthcare from the comfort and privacy of your home

main_subject.type: Split screen or dual environment showing telehealth consultation
main_subject.description: Professional female healthcare provider on screen/device and comfortable patient environment
main_subject.positioning: Split composition or layered to show both provider and patient perspective
main_subject.technology: High-quality video call interface, modern devices

environment.setting: Comfortable home environment with professional medical consultation on screen
elements: Modern laptop/tablet with video call interface
Comfortable home setting (bedroom, living room, or home office)
Professional healthcare provider visible on screen
Teal and gold accent colors in tech interface

avoid_elements: Overly casual or informal medical interaction
final_prompt: Create a modern telehealth consultation image showing a professional virtual healthcare appointment. Feature a split screen or layered composition with a professional female healthcare provider visible on a high-quality laptop/tablet screen and a comfortable, private home environment. The home setting should be clean and comfortable (bedroom, living room, or home office) with soft, natural lighting. The video interface should look modern and professional with teal and gold accent colors. The overall mood should convey convenience, privacy, and professional medical care delivered through high-quality technology. Emphasize the comfort of receiving expert healthcare from home while maintaining professional medical standards.
